question: RBI has recently given in principle approval for setting up Bharat Bill Payment Operating Unit (BBPOU), to which organization?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India has given in-principle approval to Vakrangee for setting up Bharat Bill Payment Operating Unit (BBPOU).
The approval has been granted as per the provisions contained in Payment and Settlement Systems Act, 2007. Vakrangee can now handle payment and aggregation of payment services relating to bills under BBPS.
